verses.verse: Jude <S%G2455><s%>, a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> of James <S%G2385><s%>, to them that are called <S%G2822><s%>, beloved <S%G37><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> kept <S%G5083><s%> for Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>:
Mercy <S%G1656><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G26><s%> be multiplied <S%G4129><s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, while I was giving <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> our common <S%G2839><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%>, I <S%G2192><s%> was <S%G2192><s%> constrained <S%G318><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> exhorting <S%G3870><s%> you to contend <S%G1864><s%> earnestly for the faith <S%G4102><s%> which was <S%G3860><s%> once <S%G530><s%> for all delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto the saints <S%G40><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there are <S%G3921><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> men <S%G444><s%> crept in privily <S%G3921><s%>, even they who were <S%G4270><s%> of old <S%G3819><s%> written <S%G4270><s%> of beforehand unto <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> condemnation <S%G2917><s%>, ungodly men <S%G765><s%>, turning <S%G3346><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> lasciviousness <S%G766><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> denying <S%G720><s%> our <S%G2316><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> Master1203, 2316 and2532, 2257 Lord <S%G1203><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Now I desire <S%G1014><s%> to <S%G1161><s%> put <S%G5279><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in remembrance <S%G5279><s%>, though <S%G1492><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> all things <S%G5124><s%> once <S%G530><s%> for all <S%G3754><s%>, that the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, having saved <S%G4982><s%> a people <S%G2992><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt <S%G125><s%>, afterward <S%G1208><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> them that believed <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> that kept <S%G5083><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> own principality <S%G746><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> left <S%G620><s%> their proper <S%G2398><s%> habitation <S%G3613><s%>, he hath kept <S%G5083><s%> in <S%G1199><s%> everlasting <S%G126><s%> bonds <S%G1199><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> darkness <S%G2217><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the judgment <S%G2920><s%> of the <S%G2250><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.

Even as <S%G5613><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrah <S%G1116><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, having in <S%G5158><s%> like3664, 5125 manner <S%G5158><s%> with these given themselves over to fornication <S%G1608><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gone <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> strange <S%G2087><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>, are set forth <S%G4295><s%> as an example <S%G1164><s%>, suffering <S%G5254><s%> the punishment <S%G1349><s%> of <S%G4442><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>.

Yet in like <S%G3668><s%> manner these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in their dreamings <S%G1797><s%> defile <S%G3392><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> set at nought dominion <S%G2963><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> rail <S%G987><s%> at dignities <S%G1161><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Michael <S%G3413><s%> the archangel <S%G743><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> contending <S%G1252><s%> with the devil <S%G1228><s%> he disputed <S%G1256><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%>, durst <S%G5111><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bring against him <S%G2018><s%> a <S%G2920><s%> railing <S%G988><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, The Lord <S%G2962><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

But <S%G3303><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> rail <S%G987><s%> at whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> things they know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G3745><s%> they understand <S%G1987><s%> naturally <S%G5447><s%>, like <S%G5613><s%> the creatures <S%G2226><s%> without reason <S%G249><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> these things <S%G5125><s%> are they destroyed <S%G1161><s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>! For <S%G3754><s%> they went <S%G4198><s%> in the way <S%G3598><s%> of Cain <S%G2535><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ran riotously <S%G1632><s%> in the error <S%G4106><s%> of Balaam <S%G903><s%> for hire <S%G3408><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> perished <S%G622><s%> in the gainsaying <S%G485><s%> of Korah <S%G2879><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they who are hidden rocks <S%G4694><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> love-feasts <S%G26><s%> when they feast with <S%G4910><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, shepherds that without fear <S%G870><s%> feed <S%G4165><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>; clouds <S%G3507><s%> without water <S%G504><s%>, carried along <S%G4064><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> winds <S%G417><s%>; autumn <S%G5352><s%> leaves <S%G1186><s%> without fruit <S%G175><s%>, twice <S%G1364><s%> dead <S%G599><s%>, plucked up by the roots <S%G1610><s%>;

Wild <S%G66><s%> waves <S%G2949><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%>, foaming out <S%G1890><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> shame <S%G152><s%>; wandering <S%G4107><s%> stars <S%G792><s%>, for whom <S%G3739><s%> the blackness <S%G2217><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%> hath been reserved <S%G5083><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> to these <S%G5125><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Enoch <S%G1802><s%>, the seventh <S%G1442><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Adam <S%G76><s%>, prophesied <S%G4395><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, the Lord <S%G2962><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> ten thousands <S%G3461><s%> of <S%G40><s%> his <S%G846><s%> holy ones <S%G40><s%>,

to execute <S%G4160><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> upon <S%G2596><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to convict <S%G1827><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the ungodly <S%G765><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have ungodly wrought <S%G764><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the hard <S%G4642><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> ungodly <S%G765><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> murmurers <S%G1113><s%>, complainers <S%G3202><s%>, walking <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their lusts <S%G1939><s%> (and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> great swelling <S%G5246><s%> words <S%G2296><s%>), showing respect <S%G2296><s%> of <S%G5484><s%> persons <S%G4383><s%> for the sake of <S%G5484><s%> advantage <S%G5622><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, beloved <S%G27><s%>, remember <S%G3415><s%> ye the words <S%G4487><s%> which have been spoken before <S%G4280><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

That <S%G3754><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, In <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G5550><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> mockers <S%G1703><s%>, walking <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> ungodly <S%G763><s%> lusts <S%G3754><s%>.
These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they who <S%G1438><s%> make separations <S%G592><s%>, sensual <S%G5591><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, beloved <S%G27><s%>, building up <S%G2026><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> on <S%G4102><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> most holy <S%G40><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, praying <S%G4336><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>,

keep <S%G5083><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, looking for <S%G4327><s%> the mercy <S%G1656><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> on some <S%G3739><s%> have mercy <S%G1653><s%>, who are in doubt <S%G3303><s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> save <S%G4982><s%>, snatching <S%G726><s%> them out of <S%G1537><s%> the fire <S%G4442><s%>; and on some have mercy with <S%G1722><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>; hating <S%G3404><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the garment <S%G5509><s%> spotted <S%G4695><s%> by <S%G575><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto him that is able <S%G1410><s%> to guard <S%G5442><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> from stumbling <S%G679><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to set <S%G2476><s%> you before the presence <S%G2714><s%> of <S%G1391><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> without blemish <S%G299><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> exceeding joy <S%G20><s%>,

to the <S%G2316><s%> only3441, 4680 God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%>, through Jesus Christ our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G1391><s%>, be glory, majesty <S%G3172><s%>, dominion <S%G2904><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1849><s%>, before all time <S%G2532><s%>, and now <S%G3568><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for evermore <S%G3956><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.
